description:
"When I`m home alone, sometimes I hear noises when there`s no one else around..." Wakasa reads scary magazines alone in the bathroom. Startled by a clattering sound, Wakasa turns around and tells Tatsumi not to frighten him, but there`s no one there... Wakasa grows uneasy. He worries Tatsumi, who still hasn`t returned, has run away from home, gotten into an accident, or worse. Can Wakasa handle staying home alone?!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: La situation de Wakasa seul à la maison
The Circumstances of Wakasa Staying Home Alone
若狭のおるすばん事情
